newsitem.title: USA: First Entertainment buys Global Internet stake.
newsitem.headline: First Entertainment buys Global Internet stake.

text.p: First Entertainment Inc said Thursday it has acquired a majority stake in Global Internet Corp from Global Casinos Inc.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Global Internet, formerly a subsidiary of Global Casinos, is in the process of developing a "virtual" casino on the World Wide Web, First Entertainment said.
As a result of the deal, First Entertainment said it has terminated its letter of intent to acquire assets of Online Casinos Inc. Online has agreed to the termination, it said.
First Entertainment proposed to acquire Online in March.
